text: dhikkārigaḷu tam'ma managaḷalli ud'dhaṭatanavannu (mātravalla,) ajñānada ud'dhaṭatanavannu beḷesikoṇḍāga, allāhanu tanna dūtarige hāgū viśvāsigaḷige manaḥ śāntiyannu iḷisikoṭṭanu mattu avarannu dharmaniṣṭheya mātinalli sthiragoḷisidanu. Avaru adakke heccu ar'haru hāgū yōgyarāgiddaru. Mattu allāhanu ellavannū ballavanāgiddāne
